response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an exceptional addition to your collection or business, just like it has been to ours. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a piece that is worth $1,000,000, at a significant discount. We trust that you will appreciate its quality and the value it brings. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this masterpiece with you.", "product_price": 950000}
